item.title: Synology Pushover Notifications
item.description: Intro I recently added a Synology NAS to my home lab and I am an instant fan. I have been spending time configuring and tinkering with the new device. I use Pushover for sending push notifications from various home lab services to my devices. For example, I have it integrated in Home Assistant for reminders and notifications about unique automations. When configuring notifications on the NAS, I noticed a “Push Service” tab and thought, “Great!
